participant_1.background:
My family members are all very supportive of my dreams.
I want to learn how to finish drywall like my dad.
i volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by.
i am married and have 2 kids.

participant_2.background:
I love having my laptop with me wherever I go.
my hair is as red as the sunset.
I help people find the perfect outfit, then I head out with my dog Allie to paddle board.
i started a new job this year , which is helping me learn more about socialization.
I work as a park ranger, which allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.

content.text: I am doing well today, how are you?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! I am a volunteer at my local animal shelter. What do you do for work?
That is great! I am a park ranger, and I love spending my days surrounded by nature.
That sounds like a really fun job! What are some of your favorite things about it?
I love being able to help people and animals, and I also love getting to explore new places.
That sounds great! I bet your dog, Allie, loves it too! What type of dog is Allie?
She is a red labrador retriever! She is the sweetest dog ever, and she loves to go paddle boarding with me.
That sounds amazing! I would love to go paddle boarding sometime!
We should go sometime! I would love to have a buddy to paddle board with.
That would be awesome! I will let you know when I am free.
Sounds good! I am free most weekends, so just let me know.
Great! I will talk to you soon
